leonard.description: Dr. Leonard Frrokaj is a highly experienced dentist specializing in cosmetic dentistry and orthodontics.
leonard.bio: Dr. Leonard Frrokaj has over 20 years of experience in the field.
leonard.otherInfo: Dr. Leonard Frrokaj is also a member of the American Dental Association.

benhard.description: Dr. Benhard Frrokaj is a renowned dentist with expertise in pediatric dentistry and preventive care.
benhard.bio: Dr. Benhard Frrokaj is known for her gentle approach with children.
benhard.otherInfo: Dr. Benhard Frrokaj has published several papers on pediatric dental care.

landingPage.serviceDescription1: We offer a variety of cosmetic dentistry services to help you achieve the smile you've always wanted.
landingPage.serviceDescription2: Our orthodontic treatments can help you achieve a straighter, healthier smile.
landingPage.serviceDescription3: We provide gentle and compassionate dental care for children of all ages.
landingPage.serviceDescription4: Our preventive care services can help you maintain optimal oral health and prevent dental issues.

toastMessages.dateInPast: You can't select a date in the past.
